long_description: Offering comfort-enhancing support for your hands, the Electra Ergo handlebar grips are a worthwhile upgrade for your bike's straight-end handlebar. Electra Ergo grips have broad, flared ends that provide a larger surface area under your hands than regular grips, helping relieve pressure on your palms. Fits straight-end handlebars with ends that are 26.2mm in diameter. Grips can be used on handlebars that have trigger shifters; can also be used on handlebars with grip shifters if the grip shifter is moved over on the handlebar.
short_description: Offering comfort-enhancing support for your hands, the Electra Ergo handlebar grips are a worthwhile upgrade for your bike's straight-end handlebar.
